qas.question: How many lichen forming fungi have been recorded on the island?
How many endemic species of fungi have been found?
What kind of invertebrates have been found on the island?

context: St Helena's biodiversity, however, also includes marine vertebrates, invertebrates (<a2_0>freshwater, terrestrial and marine<a2_0/>), fungi (including lichen-forming species), non-vascular plants, seaweeds and other biological groups. To date, very little is known about these, although <a0_0>more than 200<a0_0/> lichen-forming fungi have been recorded, including <a1_0>9<a1_0/> endemics, suggesting that many significant discoveries remain to be made.
